header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Find answers to common questions about our services.

items.question: What services are included in villa management?
items.answer: We handle everything from marketing, reservation management, guest verification, routine cleaning, property maintenance, to monthly financial reports. You just sit back and enjoy the profits.
items.msg: Hello, I'd like to know which services are included in your villa management. Could you share the detailed scope and sample deliverables? Thank you.

items.question: How do you market my property?
items.answer: We use a multi-platform marketing strategy, including listings on top booking sites like Airbnb and Booking.com, and promotions via social media and our travel agent network.
items.msg: Hello, could you outline your marketing & reservation strategy for my villa?

items.question: What is the villa management fee?
items.answer: We apply a commission system based on a percentage of your property's net revenue. No hidden fees. This model ensures we work hard to maximize your income.
items.msg: Hello, could you share your management fee structure?

items.question: How can I monitor my villa's performance?
items.answer: We provide a dedicated owner portal where you can view booking status, revenue reports, operating costs, and maintenance schedules transparently at any time.
items.msg: Hello, what reporting and dashboard access will I get to monitor occupancy, ADR, RevPAR, expenses, and payouts? How often are reports provided?

items.question: What if there is damage or an emergency?
items.answer: Our team is on standby 24/7 to handle any issues, from minor repairs to emergencies. We will contact you for any major decisions regarding the property.
items.msg: Hello, what is your SOP for maintenance issues or emergencies?

items.question: Do you manage newly built villas?
items.answer: Yes, we can help prepare your new property from scratch. We provide advice on interior setup, necessary equipment, and professional photos to make it market-ready.
items.msg: Hello, do you also manage newly built villas? What is your approach to preparing them for the rental market?

about.hero_desc: We are a professional team focused on villa management in Bali, providing trusted services for owners while delivering memorable experiences for every guest.
about.founder_desc1: Welcome to our villa management services. I am Dina Amelya, the founder with over 5 years of experience in the hospitality and property industry. My journey started from a deep love for Indonesia's natural beauty and the passion to create unforgettable guest experiences.
about.founder_desc2: Our philosophy is based on a simple principle: "Your Property Is Our Priority". Every villa we manage is treated like our own property, with full attention to every detail, from routine maintenance to ensuring guests feel at home. This approach is not just business, but a personal dedication to maintain your property's quality and integrity.
about.founder_quote: We believe that successful villa management is built on trust and transparent communication. We not only manage properties, but also build strong partnerships with owners to achieve shared goals.

services.hero_desc: We provide professional villa management services in Bali, ranging from marketing, maintenance, to guest services.
services.we_care_desc: From cleaning, gardens, to electrical & plumbing maintenance — our expert team handles all your property needs without exception. With high standards and proven experience, we ensure every villa receives thorough attention. Every detail is carefully monitored, from daily routine care to complex technical handling, ensuring optimal comfort and minimal disruption. With a transparent and professional approach, you can rest assured that your property is always under proper supervision.
services.we_manage_desc: We manage your property with full transparency, from creative marketing strategies to daily operations. With a systematic approach, every process is professionally handled by an experienced team. We ensure your property gets profitable reservations, trained staff according to standards, and transparent, easy-to-monitor financial reports. All this is done so you can feel confident that your property is always in its best condition.
services.we_amplify_desc: In the digital era, the power of online promotion is key to your property's success. Through global distribution strategies, SEO optimization, social media branding, and professional visuals, we help your property stand out in a competitive market. All steps are conducted with continuous evaluation to ensure maximum results.
